description: Elon Musk was born in Pretoria, South Africa. He spent his early years here before moving to pursue further education and career opportunities.
During this period, Elon Musk continued his education and early career pursuits in Pretoria, South Africa.
Elon Musk continued to reside in Pretoria, South Africa, and began to make significant strides in his entrepreneurial endeavors during this time.
From 2002 onwards, Elon Musk's career led him to various locations across different countries due to his involvement in companies like SpaceX, Tesla, and more.
